COMMUNICATION.name: Communication
COMMUNICATION.description: Restricts the way you can communicate

INPUT.name: Input Devices
INPUT.description: Restricts the input devices you can use.

LINEUP.name: Lineup
LINEUP.description: Sets requirements for your operator lineups

LOADOUT.name: Loadout
LOADOUT.description: Sets requirements for your operator loadouts

MOVEMENT.name: Movement
MOVEMENT.description: Restricts the way you can move in-game

SETTINGS.name: Game Settings
SETTINGS.description: Requires changes to your game settings

STRATEGY.name: Strategy
STRATEGY.description: Specifies how you approach your objective
